definition: of or relating to or characteristic of a violent tropical storm
details:
adjective
- of or relating to or characteristic of a violent tropical storm
= example: of or relating to or characteristic of a violent tropical storm
= synonyms: cyclonal, cyclonical
- of or relating to or characteristic of the atmosphere around a low pressure center
= example: of or relating to or characteristic of the atmosphere around a low pressure center
= synonyms: cyclonal, cyclonical
